description: "Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 554 released on March, 2010.

description: "Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 555 released on April, 2010.

description: "Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 556 released on May, 2010.
name: Morte nella Nebbia

description: "Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 558 released on July, 2010.

description: "Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 559 released on August, 2010.

description: "Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 560 released on September, 2010.
name: Moctezuma!
L'ultima vittima
Agli ordini dello Zar
La fine di un tiranno

description: His name is Johnny Boia and he is a very bad gunman dressed in black. Or almost ... in fact, it’s the new, unlikely disguise of Bat Batterton. His current client is the archaeologist George MacLeod, who is on his way to his friends Jim and Margie Coleman, owners of a ranch in Stone Hill, Vermont. Close to their farm stands a dolmen, an ancient Celtic construction, evidence that the Celts were in America before Columbus.
name: Follia Omicida

description: Zagor captures Samuel Toby a dangerous serial killer who had joined the expedition of George MacLeod . But , before he was arrested , Toby wounds Cico, and so Zagor and his friend must accept the hospitality of the Colemans, and to go to Stone- Hill , where the ruins of an ancient Celtic Dolmen have been discovered. Among the Coleman ’s  men there is also Digging Bill, who persuades Cico and Bat to open a mysterious crystal coffin, full of jewels , within which lies a perfectly preserved corpse.
name: Il Fantasma di Stone-Hill

description: Cico , Batterton and Digging Bill have inadvertently brought back to life Kandrax, a druid who led an expedition of the Celts in America and that , feeling close to death, had him buried in a glass case . The revived priest imputes to the people of Stone - Hill the disappearance of the Celts , and desires to slay them, in order to revive his ancient civilization.
name: Kandrax il Mago

description: Kandrax , with its hypnotic powers , has subdued Willie Howell and Tony Lancaster, two MacLeod employees, as well as the Indian Musky - Han , who has unleashed his Wampanoag against Zagor and his friends . The druid also managed to kidnap Margie Coleman: he wants to offer a sacrifice for his gods , and that will happen when the Moon is rising for the sixth time in the sky !
name: La Sesta Luna

description: Zagor is forced to a superhuman effort to scour the area and save Margie before   the rising of the sixth moon. He’ll do it, thinking to have neutralized the bloody Celtic Druid. But that’s not and Kandrax will come back to haunt the Spirit with the Hatchet .
name: Sandy River

description: The Proconsuls are now responsible for the public safety in East City.They have almost unlimited powers. They administer   justice with   an iron   glove,   and have   in fact   introduced   a new   martial law. Nathan   has already   clashed   with them   on several occasions.   But now ,   the upcoming   elections   for the   mayor   could bring   sensational   news. In the this   stretched   political climate ,   a series of   brutal   murders shook the   public opinion. The   murderer   will engage   a perverse   deadly game ,   with Nathan, leaving   the bodies of victims   as   clues of a puzzle   that the   Alfa   agent tries to resolve   in a desperate   race against time .
name: L'Enigmista

description: The shuttle FC 916 from Luna City crashes into a shopping center in East City, causing hundreds of casualties. Nathan Never begins his investigation but his actions are controlled by the YCS (Young Cyber -Crime Section), a quasi-governmental occult organization, whose members are convinced that the real perpetrators of the massacre are the tecnopaths, people able to establish immediate and "instinctive" control with any computer system. Meanwhile, in the Sinclair Asylum Timmy, a child with psichi powers who is probably involved in the shuttle disaster is kidnapped.
name: City Gangs

description: Igor Mc Nally, who presents himself as one of the founders of the YCS organization, offers a help to Nathan  and  Sigmund   in the search for  Timmy  and other  tecnopaths who have been ki dnapped. They, in turn, are aided  by   Sister  J, a   tecnopath   Igor  had saved  from  an ambush  of  YCS  few days  before.  Who is  Sister  J?  And what are the  real  objectives of  Y.C.S.?
name: I Tecnopati

description: Justice Theta is the most powerful hero in the world. He works tirelessly to protect the people under his care, regardless of nationality or wealth. But today it seems like nothing is going his way. Fallen Justice, a dark tale of heroes and villains that will challenge the way you see heroes, begins here.
name: Part 1: One Bad Day

description: In search of Walsh, the killer who must kill Councillor Joan Grant, Nathan comes in contact with Jamie, a young woman infiltrated among the independentists of Melpomene. Jamie directs him to Blaster, who seems to be the head of the organization that allowed the killer to get on the space station. In the meantime, Walsh seems to act undisturbed, and prepares his trap, and unbeknownst to both Nathan and his young colleague Nicole Bayeux, grim shady political intrigues are developing.
name: Intrigo su Melpomene

description: After last issue’s shocking ending, things only get worse for Justice Theta as he is nearly killed stopping a random bank robbery. Caught up in a rapidly spiraling anti-hero media campaign focused primarily on his own recent actions, he tries to put things right as best he can while learning as much as possible about his own personal problems. Meanwhile, two relatively weak enemies plot his untimely demise.
name: Part 2: A Comedy of Errors

description: In the midst of stopping a prison break from escalating into a full blown massacre, Justice Theta again finds his life in very real danger, while the Guardians vote to revoke his membership on the team. Comedy has declared war, and nothing short of the head of our hero is going to satisfy his insane thirst for revenge. While the battle rages, Dynagirl watches from home, suffering a mysterious illness that keeps her sidelined and unable to help.
name: Part 3: Mob Scene

description: Dynagirl and the Guardians show up separately, just in time to prevent Justice Theta from killing Comedy in a fit of rage, but find themselves unable to prevent his departure as he makes his escape and begins planning his next move. Dynagirl accepts help from an unlikely source in stopping her lover and has to face Simon Hurst, the man she once swore to kill.
name: Part 4: Simon Says

description:
Three short stories printed in colors, each written by one of the three Nathan Never creators Vigna, Medda and Serra, to celebrate 20th anniversary of the character.

1. Cyberspace

Nathan Never dives into cyberspace in search of three million credits disappeared during a survey conducted a few months before, with the support of the government agent Forbes and of Dieter Harper, a hacker who died just during the investigation. But who is the mysterious man who contacted Jenny, the widow of Harper, from the network?

2. War

Yet another war has just ended. In Adlan City remnants of war are scattered everywhere and causing deaths and injuries among children playing in the streets. Even the young Shady would be one of these victims, but when the boy is kidnapped from the hospital with a commando action, the the Federation commissions Alfa Agency to investigate. Legs and Nathan must find out who is responsible and what is behind the mysterious abduction.

3. Future

All the volcanoes on Earth are simultaneously erupting because of the new mad plan of Aristotle Skotos. All Alfa Agency forces struggle to stop the disaster and Nathan, Legs and other Alfa Agents get into action in Naples, Italy, trying to evacuate the city, while the Earth is likely to be covered with ash. But a shocking truth lies behind these events.
name: Tre passi nel domani

description: The Guardians regroup following the beating they took at the hands of their former leader and begin the search to find and contain Justice Theta. Dynagirl makes a deal that she desperately hopes will allow her to stop the man she loves before anyone else is killed, but Justice Theta has other ideas entirely. A look back into the history of the main characters of Fallen Justice as things continue getting worse for the most powerful man in the world.
name: Part 5: History

description: In the wake of last issue’s shocker, Justice Theta takes his new mission to the streets, killing every villain he can find! The Guardians marshal their forces and gather some back up as things become increasingly deadly for anyone with powers. Iron Will enters into a pact with the remaining heroes, and they bring the last vestiges of their power to bear in hopes it will be enough.
name: Part 6: Sudden Stop

description: As his final hours play out in bloody tragedy, Justice Theta is finally brought down, but at what cost to the world? The hero community is in shambles. Heroes and villains alike have become casualties in this war, and there may be no clear winner when the dust finally settles. Can the remaining heroes pull things together? Find out as Fallen Justice concludes in this extra sized blow out final issue!

Martin Mystere, along with archaeologists Nat Shapiro and Sarah Hunt travels to China on an expedition in search of the Hymalayan man, or rather the Metco-Kang-I, as it is called in those regions. Among Kazakh separatists, optical illusions and men in black, the expedition comes in contact with a tribe of these mysterious men to discover their origin.
name: L'uomo delle nevi

description: Martin sets out to find an expedition disappeared in the mysterious City of Diaphanous Shadows , place of origin of his friend Java . On the trail of the city is also a Japanese research team , interested in a mysterious energy source housed within its walls .
name: La città delle ombre diafane

description: In the dungeons behind the city of diaphanous shadows (the native land of Java) , a terrible secret is hidden, guarded by terrible creatures with two pairs of arms. Holed up in the ruins of the city , the survivors of three scientific expeditions , including Martin Mystère , Diana and Java , try to find a way out to return safely to civilization .
name: Le creature dell’abisso

description: The crew of Space Shuttle " Vespucci " in orbit around the Earth , is the victim of an inexplicable phenomenon : while passing over Iraq , the astronauts suffer terrifying visions . On the way back , almost all members of the mission are killed in a bombing . After these events, Martin Mystere is called to investigate.
name: Orrore nello spazio

description: This is a Beetle Baily Reprint.  The actual number is R-2
Tim Tyler's Luck Reprint number R-4

Appointed by  NASA  to discover  the origin  of  hallucinations  that have struck  the crew  of the Shuttle  Vespucci ,  Martin  Mystère and  Java  come  to Iraq ,  where they discover  a huge  " upside-down  tower  ' underground :  an ancient and  powerful weapon  that is  at  Atlantis '  origin of the  biblical myth  of the Tower of  Babel.  The mission  seems to be a  success,  but our  heroes  have  come to terms with  the Men in  Black
name: La Torre di Babele

description: This is a Flash Gordon Reprint number R-16
name: Cragmen of the Lost Continent

description: This is a Tiger Reprint Number R-1
This is a Quincy reprint number R-5
This is a Phantom Reprint number R-6

Martin and Java manage to return alive from Iraq , but the lack of evidence forces them not to make public the adventure that brought them to the discovery of the Tower of Babel. Back in  New York , Martin Mystere buys  in a second hand bookstore a volume   whose disturbing feature is that it is perfectly identical (word for word) to the  draft of the  new text that Martin  is writing...
name: Il libro degli arcani

description: This is a Prince Valiant Comic R-8
This is a reprint of Popeye number R-7

Martin ends the tale of the three intriguing riddles of the past contained in the mysterious volume he bought: the  story of the Gothic crypt of Barbados, the fate of the  mysteriously disappeared crew of the brig "Mary Celeste",and the enigma of the perpetual motion of the Wheel of  Orfyrreus.  
Then  he and Java are invited by his friend Professor Strokov to join a Soviet expedition whose purpose is to discover the origin of the terrible explosion, of unknown nature , which , in 1908, devastated the Tunguska region in Siberia .
name: Tunguska

description: This is a Blondie Reprint number R-3
This is a reprint of Hagar number R-9.
This is a Redeye reprint number R-10
This is a Blondie reprint number R-11
This is a Popeye reprint number R-12
This is a Beetle Bailey reprint number R-13
This is a Phantom reprint number R-15

The expedition to discover the origin of the Tunguska explosion has a dramatic result : Professor Kulik , hostile to Martin , dies in an attempt to kill him . The agents of the KGB , who were following the expedition , arrest Mystère that manages to escape with Java and Nadia , a young scientist with paranormal powers . In the Siberian desert the three discover a forgotten people that is the cause of the explosion.
name: Morte nella Taiga

description: New Atlantis, the utopic city described by Francis Bacon, and Vilcabamba, the legendary center of Peru sought in vain by archaeologists, are in fact the same place, namely the mysterious city of Ilcaban. William Shakespeare in his time was able to find it and was inspired by it in writing "The Tempest". In search of this lost civilization Martin Mystere is also involved, along with Angie, the basis of "Otherwhere" and Dee & Kelly.
name: New Atlantis

description:
Rick Veitch discusses the rejection of swamp thing #88, The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles and the upcoming King Hill Press. Steve Englehart talks about his firing from Marvel and two Marvel editors are questioned for their side.

Other columns include: Perspective by Adam-Troy Castro (where he contemplates the realistic-ness of super hero comics), Newsline, Coming Distractions, Comics on 450 a Month, Backstage, Video Views, Cartoon Corner, Cover Gallery, Small Talk, Comics In Review, Amazing Readers, The Cartoonist, and Stroms Index.
name: Rich Veitch From Swamp Thing To The turtles, and beyond

description: Despite winning the contest and getting her piece published in the magazine, Alice still doesn’t feel worthy of the title ”professional.” So even after what happened the first time, she insists to continue working as an assistant to Patrick, just to learn more about being a professional manhwa artist. But despite being treated like a maid by Patrick, Alice somehow ends up in his arms...
name: Vol. 2

description: Patrick’s coming up on another deadline, and Alice is all set to step in and help. Maybe he’s not such a bad buy...when he’s not making her wash his dirty underwear! But before she can give Patrick much thought, Alice’s musings are interrupted by a terrible announcement--Sangmoon High has gone bankrupt and will merge with the all-boys school, Seomoon! For Nancy and the other girls, combining with Seomoon is a fabulous chance to meet hot guys, but for Alice, moving away from her familiar classrooms and teachers is painful, not to mention having classes with Patrick! And with Mr. Hwang in Taiwan, who will Alice turn to for comfort?
name: Vol. 3

description: Since her daring rescue, Daria’s fallen hard for Patrick. But her fantasies are threatened when she spots Patrick with Alice on a late-night stroll. Is it just a manhwa lesson, or is it love? Or maybe both?! Daria’s not about to take any chances. Armed with the knowledge of Patrick “Saturn” Kang’s true identity, Daria is prepared to do everything in her power to drive him and Alice apart!
name: Vol. 4

description: Daria’s schemes have taken root; with Alice brokenhearted and Patrick feeling betrayed, now’s her chance to deliver the finishing blow--and what better place to flaunt her victory than her big birthday bash? With Patrick dancing in her arms, Daria thinks she at last has him for her own. But at this costume party, Patrick’s ready to dig up the lies and unmask the real Daria. What he didn’t expect to find was--a girl deeply in love?
name: Vol. 5
